import pyspark.sql.functions as F
import pyspark.sql.types as T
from cryptography.fernet import Fernet
import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
code:
@udf(returnType = StringType())
def decrypt(cipher_text, MASTER_KEY):
    if not cipher_text or cipher_text == np.nan or pd.isna(cipher_text) or \
        cipher_text!=cipher_text or not str(cipher_text) or cipher_text is None:
        cipher_text = ''
    from cryptography.fernet import Fernet
    f = Fernet(MASTER_KEY)
    clear_val=f.decrypt(cipher_text.encode()).decode()
    return clear_val
